metadata.titleEn: Database of the Tibetan Plateau vortex derived from multiple reanalysis (1979-2021)
metadata.titleCn: 多再分析数据得到的高原低涡数据集（1979-2021）
metadata.description: The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau is the source of many major rivers in Asia, providing essential water for hundreds of millions of people, and is known as the "Water Tower of Asia". The main source of water recharge for the Asian Water Tower is precipitation from the Tibetan Plateau, of which the Tibetan Plateau vortex (TPV) is one of the important precipitation-producing systems on the Tibetan Plateau. Due to the complex topography of the Tibetan Plateau and the lack of observational data, there are still many gaps in the understanding of the climatic and structural characteristics of the TPVs and their formation and change mechanisms. This dataset uses multiple sets of reanalysis data and objective identification methods to obtain a long time series TPVs dataset, including the location, radius, intensity, life history, and movement path  and other characteristics. The reanalysis datasets used in the dataset are: NCEP1 (NCEP/NCAR), NCEP2 (NCEP/DOE), ERA-Interim, ERA-40, ERA-5, CFSR, MERRA2, JRA55, NCEP FNL, CRA40, etc. NCEP1 and NCEP2 have lower resolution and the obtained highland low vortices are not applicable as climate feature analysis.
metadata.descriptionCn: 青藏高原是亚洲众多主要河流的源头，为亿万人口提供生活必需的水源，被称为“亚洲水塔”。亚洲水塔的主要补给水源为青藏高原地区的降水，其中高原低涡是青藏高原上重要的降水系统之一。由于青藏高原地形复杂、观测资料匮乏，对高原低涡的气候和结构特征及其形成和变化机制的认识仍然存在很多不足之处。本数据集利用多套再分析资料和高原低涡的客观识别方法，得到了一套长时间序列高原低涡数据集，包括高原低涡的位置、半径、强度、生命史和移动路径等特征，本数据集可用于高原低涡的气候特征分析、高原低涡对降水影响、高原低涡生成发展和移出机制研究等。数据集使用的再分析数据有：NCEP1（NCEP/NCAR），NCEP2（NCEP/DOE），ERA-Interim，ERA-40，ERA-5，CFSR，MERRA2，JRA55，NCEP FNL，CRA40等共10套再分析数据，其中NCEP1和NCEP2的分辨率较低，得到的高原低涡不适用作为气候特征分析。
metadata.instructions:
File naming: The TPVs dataset is stored in text format, and the file name is "reanalysis data-yyyy.txt", where yyyy is the year, e.g. ERA5-2010.txt means that the file describes the TPVs obtained from the ERA5 reanalysis data for the year 2010.
The first row shows the number of TPVs for that year, and the second row gives the TPV properties for each column.
After that, the first line of each TPV gives the name and the number of atcive times. A TPV is named as: TPV_YYYYMMDDHH_LON_LAT, YYYY, MM, DD, and HH are the year, month, and day when the TPV was generated, and LON and LAT are the initial locations of the TPV.
The location and properties of the TPV for each time step are given line by line.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：高原低涡数据集以文本格式存储，文件名称为“再分析数据-yyyy.txt”，其中yyyy为年份，比如 ERA5-2010.txt表示该文件描述了2010年一年中从ERA5再分析数据获取的高原低涡。
文件读取读取方式：该数据集中的所有ACCII码文件可以直接用文本程序（如记事本）打开，第一行为该年份高原低涡个数，第二行为给出了每一列对应的低涡属性。
之后每个高原低涡的第一行先给出低涡名称和该低涡的活动次数，低涡名称为：TPV_YYYYMMDDHH_LON_LAT, YYYY，MM，DD，HH分别为高原低涡生成的年月日时，LON和LAT为高原低涡的生成位置。
高原低涡的每个时次的活动位置和属性逐行给出。

literatureList.titleEn: Climatology of Tibetan Plateau Vortices Derived from Multiple Reanalysis Datasets.
literatureList.referenceEn: Lin, Z.Q., Guo, W.D., & Jia, L., et al. (2020). Climatology of Tibetan Plateau Vortices Derived from Multiple Reanalysis Datasets. Climate Dynamics, 55(7-8), 2237-2252. doi: 10.1007/s00382-020-05380-6

literatureList.titleEn: Analysis of Tibetan Vortex Activities Using 1979-2013 ERA-Interim Reanalysis
literatureList.referenceEn: Lin, Z.Q. (2015). Analysis of Tibetan Vortex Activities Using 1979-2013 ERA-Interim Reanalysis. Journal of Meteorological Research, 29(5), 720-734. doi: 10.1007/s13351-015-4273-x.

background: As early as in the 1960s, Chen (1964) and Wu (1964) reported the existence of Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs). A subsequent study noted that the horizontal scale of a TPV is approximately 500 km and its vertical scale is approximately 2–3 km (Ye and Gao, 1979). These shallow systems are produced in the Tibetan boundary layer during boreal summer, wherein Nagqu is one of the key source regions. The TPV is a sub-synoptic low-pressure gyre (Li, 2007; Chen and Li, 2011), whose formation and development is.
research objective: Will global warming–related surface air temperature rises over the TP have an effect upon the genesis/development and (thermal) structure of TPVs? Finally, TPVs are responsible for extremely large discrepancies in precipitation over the TP, causing low predictability of rainfall areas and intensity. This is a key point in operational weather forecasting in the TP region, and is the direction of our future research efforts.
challenges: Because of the sparse distribution of stations over the TP and thus insufficient observations, it is difficult to examine the track of a long-lived TPV traveling long distance over the region. Uncertainties may arise in studies of TPVs because of the subjective limitation of the survey work carried out by meteorologists.
methods: In the present work, an in-depth exploration of the activities of TPVs is performed, based on the ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) data for the period 1979–2013.
dataset: Based on the ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) 500-hPa height data for the period 1979–2013, the Tibetan Plateau vortex (TPV) activities are investigated with an objective identification and tracking algorithm. A TPV activity dataset is thus derived.
findings: Examination of the TPV frequency, intensity, persistence, geographical location, and migration from the TP suggests an average of 53 TPVs annually during the study period, with 6.7 of them shifting out of the TP. For these vortexes, the longer the lifetime, the lower the frequency, and 81% of the TPVs are initially warm in nature. The particularly high-intensity vortexes occur dominantly in the rainy period (May–September), with their origin mainly in western Nagqu and northern Ali. They disappear largely in the Tanggula maintain area on the east side of the vortex high-frequency center and the Dangqu River valley in western Qinghai Province, possibly due to the topography. It is also found that the frequency of TPVs is decreasing, with 2 fewer TPV occurrences per 10 yr. Meanwhile, it is statistically significant that 1.4 fewer TPVs move out of the TP and the percentage of TPVs moving out of the TP versus the total number of TPVs has reduced by 2.3% every 10 yr.
backgroundCn: 早在1960年代，陈（1964）和吴（1964）就报告了青藏 Plateau涡旋（TPVs）的存在。随后的研究指出，TPV的水平尺度约为500公里，垂直尺度约为2-3公里（叶和高，1979）。这些浅层系统是在北半球夏季的青藏边界层中产生的，其中那曲是一个关键的源区。TPV是一个亚天气尺度的低压涡旋（李，2007；陈和李，2011），其形成和发展是。
research objectiveCn: 全球变暖导致的青藏高原表面气温上升是否会对青藏高原涡旋（TPVs）的生成/发展及其（热）结构产生影响？最终，青藏高原涡旋对青藏高原的降水产生极大的差异，导致降水区域和强度的低可预测性。这是青藏高原地区气象预报中的一个关键点，也是我们未来研究的方向。
challengesCn: 由于站点在热带地区的稀疏分布以及观测数据不足，难以研究长时间存在的热带气旋在该地区长距离移动的轨迹。在对热带气旋的研究中，由于气象学家进行的调查工作存在主观限制，可能会产生不确定性。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，基于1979年至2013年的欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时再分析（ERA-Interim）数据，对热带气旋活动进行了深入探讨。
datasetCn: 基于欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时再分析（ERA-Interim）1979年至2013年的500-hPa高度数据，研究了青藏 Plateau涡旋（TPV）活动，并采用了客观识别和跟踪算法。因此，得出了一个TPV活动数据集。
findingsCn: 对TPV频率、强度、持续性、地理位置和从TP迁移的研究表明，在研究期间平均每年有53个TPV，其中6.7个从TP迁出。对于这些涡旋，生命周期越长，频率越低，81%的TPV最初呈现温暖特性。特别高强度的涡旋主要发生在雨季（5月至9月），其起源主要位于西部的那曲和北部的阿里。它们主要在涡旋高频中心东侧的唐古拉山维持区和青海省西部的当曲河谷消失，这可能与地形有关。还发现TPV的频率正在下降，每10年减少2个TPV的发生。同时，TPV迁出TP的数量显著减少，每10年减少1.4个TPV，迁出TP的TPV占总TPV的比例每10年减少2.3%。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the complexity of the Tibetan Plateau's terrain and lack of observational data pose challenges to understanding the climate and structural characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Verification.QuestionCn: 青藏高原复杂的地形和缺乏观测数据确实对理解青藏高原涡旋的气候和结构特征构成了挑战。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the ECMWF Interim reanalysis data utilized for deriving a dataset related to Tibetan Plateau vortex activities?
Verification.QuestionCn: ECMWF临时再分析数据是否用于推导与青藏 Plateau涡旋活动相关的数据集？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are Tibetan Plateau vortex activities identified using objective identification and tracking algorithms, subjective analysis by experts, or a combination of both?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 青藏高原涡旋活动是通过客观识别和跟踪算法、专家的主观分析，还是两者的结合来识别的？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the challenges in collecting data on Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs) due to geographical and observational constraints?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 收集关于青藏 Plateau 漩涡（TPVs）数据的挑战主要由于地理和观测限制。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are used to study the activities of Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs)?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 研究西藏高原涡旋（TPVs）活动的数据收集方法有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the key source regions for Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs), and how do these affect data collection strategies?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 青藏 Plateau 涡旋（TPVs）的主要源区在哪里，这些涡旋如何影响数据收集策略？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to study the Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs) and their impact on precipitation?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究青藏 Plateau 漩涡（TPVs）及其对降水影响的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to study the Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs) is the utilization of ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) data from 1979 to 2013. This method involves using a reanalysis dataset to objectively identify and track TPV activities, capturing various characteristics such as frequency, intensity, and movement.
Example.AnswerCn: 研究西藏高原涡旋（TPVs）的一种数据收集方法是利用1979年至2013年的欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时再分析（ERA-Interim）数据。该方法涉及使用再分析数据集客观地识别和跟踪TPV活动，捕捉频率、强度和移动等各种特征。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting data on the Tibetan Plateau vortexes, and how is it addressed?
Example.QuestionCn: 在收集关于青藏高原涡旋的数据时面临的一个挑战是高海拔地区的气象观测站数量有限，这使得数据收集变得困难。为了解决这个问题，研究人员可以利用遥感技术和气候模型来补充现场观测数据，从而获得更全面的气象信息。
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in collecting data on the Tibetan Plateau vortexes is the sparse distribution of observation stations, which leads to insufficient data for examining long-lived TPVs. This challenge is addressed by employing objective identification and tracking algorithms using reanalysis data, which helps to overcome the limitations of sparse observational networks.
Example.AnswerCn: 在收集关于青藏高原涡旋的数据时，一个挑战是观测站的稀疏分布，这导致对长期存在的青藏高原涡旋的研究数据不足。为了解决这一挑战，采用了基于再分析数据的客观识别和跟踪算法，这有助于克服稀疏观测网络的局限性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with data collection of Tibetan Plateau vortexes due to the region's geography and climate?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 与青藏高原涡旋的数据收集相关的挑战包括该地区的地理和气候因素。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: complex terrain, sparse distribution of observation stations, insufficient observations, uncertainties in studies
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 复杂地形、观测站分布稀疏、观测不足、研究不确定性

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes of TPVs are analyzed to understand their impact on precipitation over the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 为了理解热带气旋对青藏高原降水的影响，分析了哪些热带气旋的属性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: frequency, intensity, persistence, geographical location, migration patterns
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 频率、强度、持续性、地理位置、迁移模式

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many reanalysis datasets are utilized for generating the highland low vortex dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于生成高地低涡数据集的再分析数据集有多少个？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is a Tibetan Plateau vortex (TPV) in the context of meteorological data analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气象数据分析的背景下，西藏高原涡旋（TPV）是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A Tibetan Plateau vortex (TPV) is a sub-synoptic low-pressure gyre with a horizontal scale of approximately 500 km and a vertical scale of 2–3 km. It is produced in the Tibetan boundary layer during the boreal summer and is considered an important precipitation system over the Tibetan Plateau.
Definition.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau 漩涡（TPV）是一种亚天气尺度的低压旋涡，水平尺度约为 500 公里，垂直尺度为 2-3 公里。它是在北半球夏季期间在青藏边界层中产生的，被认为是青藏 Plateau 上重要的降水系统。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'objective identification and tracking algorithm' mean in the context of TPV data analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在TPV数据分析的上下文中，“目标识别和跟踪算法”指的是一种用于识别和跟踪特定目标（如物体、事件或现象）的算法。这种算法通常利用传感器数据或图像数据来检测目标的位置、运动和状态，以便进行进一步分析和处理。
Definition.AnswerEn: An 'objective identification and tracking algorithm' in the context of TPV data analysis refers to a systematic method used to detect and follow the activities of Tibetan Plateau vortexes over time, using reanalysis data to derive a dataset that includes characteristics such as location, radius, intensity, and movement paths.
Definition.AnswerCn: “客观识别和跟踪算法”在TPV数据分析的背景下，指的是一种系统的方法，用于检测和跟踪西藏高原涡旋的活动，利用再分析数据来推导出一个数据集，其中包括位置、半径、强度和运动路径等特征。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'reanalysis data' in the context of studying Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在研究青藏 Plateau 漩涡的背景下，“再分析数据”是指通过结合观测数据和数值模型来生成的气象数据集。这些数据集提供了过去一段时间内的气象变量的连续、均匀和高分辨率的估计，通常用于气候研究和天气预报。
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Reanalysis data' refers to a comprehensive set of meteorological data that integrates past observations and modern forecasting models, providing a consistent dataset over time. It is used to study TPVs by supplying long-term weather data needed for analyzing climate characteristics and vortex dynamics over the Tibetan Plateau.
Definition.AnswerCn: “再分析数据”是指一套综合的气象数据，整合了过去的观测和现代的预报模型，提供了一致的时间序列数据。它用于研究热带气旋（TPVs），通过提供分析气候特征和青藏 Plateau 上涡旋动力学所需的长期天气数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do data collection methods utilizing ECMWF Interim reanalysis data for Tibetan Plateau vortexes compare to those using multiple reanalysis datasets like NCEP1, ERA-5, and JRA55 in terms of accuracy and comprehensiveness?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 利用ECMWF临时重分析数据收集西藏高原涡旋的数据方法与使用多个重分析数据集（如NCEP1、ERA-5和JRA55）相比，在准确性和全面性方面如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Data collection using ECMWF Interim reanalysis focuses on a single dataset, providing consistent methodology but potentially limited by its own resolution and biases. In contrast, using multiple reanalysis datasets such as NCEP1, ERA-5, and JRA55 can offer a broader perspective, allowing cross-validation and potentially higher accuracy and comprehensiveness by comparing and combining different data sources, though it may introduce complexity in harmonizing data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用ECMWF临时再分析进行数据收集专注于单一数据集，提供了一致的方法论，但可能受到自身分辨率和偏差的限制。相比之下，使用多个再分析数据集，如NCEP1、ERA-5和JRA55，可以提供更广泛的视角，通过比较和结合不同的数据源，允许交叉验证，并可能提高准确性和全面性，尽管这可能会在数据协调上引入复杂性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when identifying and tracking Tibetan Plateau vortexes using reanalysis datasets compared to direct observational methods?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在使用再分析数据集识别和跟踪青藏 Plateau 漩涡时，与直接观测方法相比，面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Reanalysis datasets, such as ERA-Interim and others, allow for consistent and extensive temporal coverage, overcoming the sparse distribution of observational stations. However, they may lack the granularity and real-time data of direct observations. Direct observational methods provide detailed local data but face limitations due to the region's sparse station distribution and difficult terrain, leading to challenges in obtaining comprehensive data coverage.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 再分析数据集，如ERA-Interim等，提供了一致且广泛的时间覆盖，克服了观测站分布稀疏的问题。然而，它们可能缺乏直接观测的细致程度和实时数据。直接观测方法提供了详细的地方数据，但由于该地区观测站分布稀疏和地形复杂，导致获取全面数据覆盖面临挑战。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of multiple reanalysis datasets enhance the understanding of the formation and movement of Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs)?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多重再分析数据集的整合如何增强对青藏 Plateau 涡旋（TPVs）形成和运动的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of multiple reanalysis datasets allows for a comprehensive analysis of TPVs by providing diverse data sources that can improve the accuracy and reliability of identifying and tracking these vortexes. Utilizing datasets like NCEP, ERA, and MERRA2, each with different resolutions and characteristics, can help overcome the limitations of sparse observational data and provide a more detailed picture of TPV dynamics, including their position, intensity, and movement patterns.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多个再分析数据集的整合可以通过提供多样的数据来源来进行全面的TPV分析，从而提高识别和追踪这些涡旋的准确性和可靠性。利用像NCEP、ERA和MERRA2这样的数据集，每个数据集具有不同的分辨率和特征，可以帮助克服稀疏观测数据的局限性，并提供TPV动态的更详细图景，包括它们的位置、强度和运动模式。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in examining the track of long-lived Tibetan Plateau vortexes over the region?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响研究青藏 Plateau 长寿命涡旋轨迹的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The sparse distribution of observation stations over the Tibetan Plateau leads to insufficient observational data, making it difficult to track long-lived Tibetan Plateau vortexes as they travel across the region. Additionally, the subjective limitations of survey work by meteorologists can introduce uncertainties in studies of these vortexes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于观测站在青藏高原的稀疏分布，观测数据不足，使得难以追踪长寿命的青藏高原涡旋在该地区的移动。此外，气象学家在调查工作中的主观限制可能会给这些涡旋的研究带来不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might the use of certain reanalysis datasets be less suitable for analyzing the climate characteristics of the Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 某些再分析数据集在分析青藏 Plateau 漩涡的气候特征时可能不太适用的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Certain reanalysis datasets, such as those with lower resolution like NCEP1 and NCEP2, might be less suitable for analyzing the climate characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortexes due to their inability to accurately capture the detailed features and dynamics necessary for such analyses.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 某些再分析数据集，如分辨率较低的NCEP1和NCEP2，可能不太适合分析青藏 Plateau涡旋的气候特征，因为它们无法准确捕捉进行此类分析所需的详细特征和动态。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the Tibetan Plateau vortex frequency and migration tendencies to change over the decades?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 是什么导致青藏 Plateau 漩涡频率和迁移趋势在几十年间发生变化？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The frequency of Tibetan Plateau vortexes is decreasing, with statistical evidence showing 2 fewer occurrences per decade. There is also a significant reduction in both the number of vortexes moving out of the plateau and the percentage of those that do, with a decrease of 1.4 vortexes and 2.3% every decade, respectively. These changes could be influenced by regional climate dynamics, including global warming-related surface air temperature rises.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 西藏高原涡旋的频率正在下降，统计数据显示每十年减少2个涡旋。此外，涡旋从高原移动出去的数量和比例也显著减少，每十年分别减少1.4个涡旋和2.3%。这些变化可能受到区域气候动态的影响，包括与全球变暖相关的地表空气温度上升。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the sparse distribution of observation stations over the Tibetan Plateau affect the data collection process for studying vortex activities?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 稀疏的观测站分布在青藏 Plateau 上可能会如何影响研究涡旋活动的数据收集过程？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The sparse distribution of observation stations over the Tibetan Plateau could lead to challenges in tracking long-lived vortices over the region, resulting in uncertainties and limitations in the observational data. This may impact the ability to accurately identify and analyze the tracks and characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortices, necessitating reliance on reanalysis data and objective identification and tracking algorithms.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在青藏 Plateau 上观测站的稀疏分布可能导致跟踪该地区长寿命涡旋的挑战，从而导致观测数据的不确定性和局限性。这可能影响准确识别和分析青藏 Plateau 涡旋的轨迹和特征的能力，因此需要依赖再分析数据和客观识别与跟踪算法。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: If the frequency of Tibetan Plateau vortices is decreasing, what implications does this have for developing data collection methods and datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果青藏高原涡旋的频率正在下降，这对开发数据收集方法和数据集有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: A decrease in the frequency of Tibetan Plateau vortices implies the need for adaptive data collection methods and datasets that can capture rare events with high precision. It suggests focusing on enhancing tracking algorithms and increasing observational coverage to ensure that even infrequent vortex occurrences are documented accurately. This trend also highlights the importance of studying changes in environmental conditions that may affect vortex formation and development.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 西藏高原涡旋频率的减少意味着需要采用适应性的数据收集方法和能够高精度捕捉稀有事件的数据集。这表明需要重点增强跟踪算法并增加观测覆盖，以确保即使是罕见的涡旋事件也能被准确记录。这个趋势还强调了研究可能影响涡旋形成和发展的环境条件变化的重要性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary goals of creating a dataset that utilizes multiple reanalysis data sources and objective identification methods for studying Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 创建一个利用多个再分析数据源和客观识别方法来研究青藏 Plateau 漩涡的数据集的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goals are to analyze the climate characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortexes, assess their impact on precipitation, and study the mechanisms of their formation, development, and movement. This is crucial due to the complex topography and scarce observational data in the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是分析青藏 Plateau 漩涡的气候特征，评估它们对降水的影响，并研究它们的形成、发展和移动机制。这一点至关重要，因为该地区地形复杂，观测数据稀缺。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the significance of understanding the genesis and development of Tibetan Plateau vortexes in the context of global warming?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 理解青藏 Plateau 漩涡的起源和发展在全球变暖的背景下具有重要意义。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding the genesis and development of Tibetan Plateau vortexes is significant in the context of global warming because changes in surface air temperature over the Tibetan Plateau could affect the thermal structure and formation of these vortexes, which are responsible for large discrepancies in regional precipitation and pose challenges for weather forecasting.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 理解青藏 Plateau 漩涡的产生和发展在全球变暖的背景下具有重要意义，因为青藏 Plateau 表面的气温变化可能会影响这些漩涡的热结构和形成，而这些漩涡负责区域降水的巨大差异，并给天气预报带来挑战。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are necessary to utilize multiple reanalysis datasets for the creation of a long-term Tibetan Plateau vortex dataset, taking into account the varying resolutions and compatibility of these datasets?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了利用多个再分析数据集创建一个长期的青藏 Plateau 漩涡数据集，考虑到这些数据集的不同分辨率和兼容性，必要的程序步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps include using a set of objective identification methods for TPVs, employing reanalysis datasets like NCEP1, NCEP2, ERA-Interim, and others. These datasets provide information on TPV characteristics such as position, radius, intensity, and movement paths, while considering the resolution limitations of datasets like NCEP1 and NCEP2 for climatic analysis.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序步骤包括使用一套客观识别方法来识别热带气旋（TPVs），利用重分析数据集如NCEP1、NCEP2、ERA-Interim等。这些数据集提供了TPV特征的信息，如位置、半径、强度和移动路径，同时考虑到NCEP1和NCEP2等数据集在气候分析中的分辨率限制。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can researchers address the challenges of sparse observation data and subjective survey work when analyzing the climate and structure characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何在分析青藏 Plateau 漩涡的气候和结构特征时，解决稀疏观测数据和主观调查工作带来的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Researchers can utilize reanalysis data, such as the ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim), to perform an in-depth exploration of TPV activities. This approach helps overcome sparse observation challenges by providing consistent and comprehensive data coverage, reducing reliance on subjective survey work.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究人员可以利用再分析数据，如欧洲中期天气预报中心的临时再分析（ERA-Interim），对热带气旋活动进行深入探索。这种方法有助于克服观测稀疏带来的挑战，通过提供一致和全面的数据覆盖，减少对主观调查工作的依赖。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches can be employed to objectively identify and track Tibetan Plateau vortex activities within reanalysis datasets, and what are the key steps involved in this process?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些方法论来客观识别和跟踪重分析数据集中青藏 Plateau 漩涡活动，以及这一过程中的关键步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: An objective identification and tracking algorithm can be employed to analyze TPV activities using 500-hPa height data from reanalysis datasets like ERA-Interim. This involves assessing TPV frequency, intensity, persistence, geographical location, and migration patterns, ultimately deriving a TPV activity dataset.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 可以使用客观识别和跟踪算法，通过分析来自重分析数据集（如ERA-Interim）的500-hPa高度数据来研究TPV活动。这涉及评估TPV的频率、强度、持续性、地理位置和迁移模式，最终得出TPV活动数据集。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies or algorithms enable the objective identification and tracking of Tibetan Plateau vortex activities from reanalysis data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论或算法能够从再分析数据中客观识别和跟踪青藏 Plateau 漩涡活动？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The objective identification and tracking of Tibetan Plateau vortex activities are enabled by using an objective identification and tracking algorithm applied to reanalysis data, such as ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) data, to derive a dataset that includes frequency, intensity, persistence, geographical location, and migration information of the vortexes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 通过使用应用于再分析数据（如欧洲中期天气预报中心的临时再分析数据ERA-Interim）的客观识别和跟踪算法，可以客观地识别和跟踪青藏 Plateau 漩涡活动，从而得出一个数据集，该数据集包括漩涡的频率、强度、持续性、地理位置和迁移信息。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do the sparse distribution of observational stations over the Tibetan Plateau affect the quality and reliability of data collection for studying vortexes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 稀疏的观测站分布在青藏 Plateau 上如何影响研究涡旋的数据收集质量和可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The sparse distribution of stations over the Tibetan Plateau leads to insufficient observations, which makes it difficult to examine the track of long-lived Tibetan Plateau vortexes traveling across the region and can introduce uncertainties in studies due to the subjective limitations of survey work carried out by meteorologists.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 青藏 Plateau 上站点分布稀疏，导致观测不足，这使得难以研究长寿命青藏 Plateau 漩涡在该地区的轨迹，并可能由于气象学家进行的调查工作主观限制而引入不确定性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or technological resources are necessary to improve the predictability of rainfall areas and intensity affected by Tibetan Plateau vortexes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 改善受青藏 Plateau 涡旋影响的降雨区域和强度的可预测性所需的条件或技术资源是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: To improve the predictability of rainfall areas and intensity influenced by Tibetan Plateau vortexes, it is necessary to address the low predictability of these systems by using comprehensive reanalysis datasets, such as NCEP, ERA, and others, and employing advanced computational models to better understand the formation, development, and migration patterns of the vortexes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 为了提高受青藏 Plateau 涡旋影响的降雨区域和强度的可预测性，有必要通过使用综合再分析数据集，如 NCEP、ERA 等，来解决这些系统的低可预测性，并采用先进的计算模型，以更好地理解涡旋的形成、发展和迁移模式。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be discrepancies in the anticipated outcomes when tracking the Tibetan Plateau vortexes using reanalysis data?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用再分析数据跟踪青藏 Plateau 漩涡时，预期结果可能存在差异的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Discrepancies may arise due to the sparse distribution of observation stations over the Tibetan Plateau, leading to insufficient data, and the subjective limitations of survey methodologies previously used by meteorologists.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于观察站在青藏高原的稀疏分布，可能会导致数据不足，以及气象学家之前使用的调查方法的主观局限性，从而产生差异。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the expected number of Tibetan Plateau vortexes decrease over time when analyzed with reanalysis datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在使用再分析数据集进行分析时，预计青藏高原涡旋的数量会随着时间的推移而减少？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The analysis of reanalysis datasets suggests a statistically significant decrease in the frequency of Tibetan Plateau vortexes, which may be attributed to global warming-related changes in surface air temperatures affecting their genesis and development.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对再分析数据集的分析表明，青藏 Plateau 漩涡的频率显著下降，这可能与全球变暖相关的地表气温变化影响其生成和发展有关。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using multiple reanalysis datasets for identifying Tibetan Plateau vortexes, considering the complex terrain and sparse observational data in the region?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用多个再分析数据集识别青藏 Plateau 漩涡的有效性，考虑到该地区复杂的地形和稀疏的观测数据？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multiple reanalysis datasets, such as ERA-Interim and others, provides a comprehensive approach to capturing Tibetan Plateau vortexes over a long time series. This method compensates for the sparse distribution of observational stations and the complex terrain of the Tibetan Plateau. However, the lower resolution of some datasets, like NCEP1 and NCEP2, may limit their suitability for detailed climate feature analysis.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用多个再分析数据集，如ERA-Interim等，提供了一种全面的方法来捕捉青藏 Plateau 漩涡的长期时间序列。这种方法弥补了观测站分布稀疏和青藏 Plateau 复杂地形的不足。然而，一些数据集（如NCEP1和NCEP2）的较低分辨率可能限制了它们在详细气候特征分析中的适用性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the significant challenges faced in tracking long-lived Tibetan Plateau vortexes using objective identification and tracking algorithms?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在使用客观识别和跟踪算法跟踪长寿命的青藏 Plateau 漩涡时，面临的重大挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Tracking long-lived Tibetan Plateau vortexes is challenging due to the sparse distribution of observational stations, which leads to insufficient data. Additionally, the subjective nature of survey work and potential uncertainties in reanalysis data can complicate the objective identification and tracking of these vortexes, affecting the accuracy of their movement and development analysis.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 追踪长期存在的青藏 Plateau 漩涡具有挑战性，因为观测站的稀疏分布导致数据不足。此外，调查工作的主观性和再分析数据中的潜在不确定性可能会使这些漩涡的客观识别和追踪变得复杂，从而影响其运动和发展分析的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand how the complexities of the Tibetan Plateau's terrain affect the data collection methods for studying plateau vortexes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白青藏高原复杂的地形如何影响研究高原涡旋的数据收集方法。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The complex terrain of the Tibetan Plateau poses challenges for data collection as it leads to sparse distribution of observation stations, making it difficult to track long-lived TPVs over long distances. This insufficient observational data requires reliance on reanalysis datasets, such as those from ECMWF Interim reanalysis, to study the TPVs.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 青藏高原复杂的地形给数据收集带来了挑战，导致观测站分布稀疏，使得跟踪长时间存在的热带气旋（TPVs）变得困难。这种观测数据的不足需要依赖再分析数据集，例如欧洲中期天气预报中心（ECMWF）临时再分析数据，来研究热带气旋。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out why the tracking of Tibetan Plateau vortexes relies heavily on reanalysis data instead of real-time observational data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么对青藏 Plateau 漩涡的追踪主要依赖再分析数据而不是实时观测数据。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The tracking of Tibetan Plateau vortexes relies on reanalysis data due to the lack of sufficient real-time observational data, as the region has a sparse network of observation stations. Reanalysis data provides a comprehensive and consistent dataset by assimilating available observations and modeling, such as the ERA-Interim data used for studying TPVs.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 对青藏 Plateau 漩涡的追踪依赖于再分析数据，因为该地区观测站网络稀疏，缺乏足够的实时观测数据。再分析数据通过同化可用观测和建模提供了一个全面且一致的数据集，例如用于研究青藏 Plateau 漩涡的 ERA-Interim 数据。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand why there seems to be a challenge in predicting the rainfall areas and intensity related to Tibetan Plateau vortexes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么在预测与青藏 Plateau 涡旋相关的降雨区域和强度方面似乎存在挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The prediction of rainfall areas and intensity related to Tibetan Plateau vortexes is challenging due to the low predictability of these systems, which are influenced by their complexity and the limited observations available. The TPVs are responsible for large discrepancies in precipitation over the region, complicating operational weather forecasting efforts.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 与青藏 Plateau 涡旋相关的降雨区域和强度的预测具有挑战性，因为这些系统的可预测性较低，受到其复杂性和可用观测数据有限的影响。青藏 Plateau 涡旋导致该地区降水存在较大差异，给操作性天气预报工作带来了复杂性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore and summarize various data collection methods used in obtaining Tibetan Plateau vortex datasets, focusing on their effectiveness and limitations.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨并总结用于获取青藏 Plateau 漩涡数据集的各种数据收集方法，重点关注它们的有效性和局限性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data collection in the Tibetan Plateau vortex domain primarily utilizes reanalysis datasets due to the sparse distribution of observation stations. The reanalysis datasets like ERA-Interim provide consistent and long-term atmospheric data, which is crucial for tracking and analyzing Tibetan Plateau vortexes (TPVs). However, these datasets may have limitations due to low spatial resolution, which affects the accuracy of identifying and tracking smaller-scale vortexes. The use of objective identification and tracking algorithms helps mitigate some of these limitations by systematically analyzing the reanalysis data.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在青藏 Plateau 漩涡领域的数据收集主要依赖于再分析数据集，因为观测站的分布稀疏。像 ERA-Interim 这样的再分析数据集提供了一致且长期的大气数据，这对于追踪和分析青藏 Plateau 漩涡（TPVs）至关重要。然而，由于空间分辨率低，这些数据集可能存在局限性，影响了识别和追踪小尺度漩涡的准确性。使用客观识别和追踪算法有助于通过系统地分析再分析数据来减轻这些局限性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges involved in collecting and analyzing data related to Tibetan Plateau vortexes and suggest potential methodologies to overcome these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析与收集和分析与青藏高原涡旋相关的数据所涉及的挑战，并建议克服这些挑战的潜在方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The main challenges in collecting and analyzing data on Tibetan Plateau vortexes include the complex terrain of the plateau, sparse observational data, and the subjective limitations of manual survey work by meteorologists. To overcome these challenges, utilizing high-resolution reanalysis datasets and implementing objective identification and tracking algorithms can improve data accuracy. Additionally, enhancing local observation networks and incorporating satellite-based remote sensing data could provide more comprehensive coverage and detail, reducing uncertainties in TPV studies.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 收集和分析青藏 Plateau 涡旋数据的主要挑战包括高原复杂的地形、稀疏的观测数据以及气象学家手动调查工作的主观局限性。为了克服这些挑战，利用高分辨率再分析数据集和实施客观识别与跟踪算法可以提高数据的准确性。此外，增强地方观测网络并结合基于卫星的遥感数据可以提供更全面的覆盖和细节，从而减少青藏 Plateau 涡旋研究中的不确定性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and evaluate potential datasets that could be utilized to study the climate and structural characteristics of Tibetan Plateau vortexes, considering both current and emerging data sources.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别和评估可以用于研究青藏高原涡旋的气候和结构特征的潜在数据集，考虑当前和新兴的数据源。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets for studying Tibetan Plateau vortexes include the ECMWF Interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim), along with other reanalysis datasets such as ERA-5, MERRA2, and JRA55. These datasets provide long-term atmospheric data with varying spatial resolutions. While lower resolution datasets like NCEP1 and NCEP2 might not be suitable for detailed climate characteristic analyses, the higher resolution datasets offer a more robust framework for studying the formation, development, and migration of TPVs. Emerging data sources like the latest satellite observations and improved ground-based sensor networks could further enhance the granularity and accuracy of TPV studies.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 研究青藏 Plateau 涡旋的潜在数据集包括 ECMWF 临时重分析（ERA-Interim），以及其他重分析数据集如 ERA-5、MERRA2 和 JRA55。这些数据集提供了长期的大气数据，具有不同的空间分辨率。虽然像 NCEP1 和 NCEP2 这样的低分辨率数据集可能不适合详细的气候特征分析，但高分辨率数据集为研究 TPV 的形成、发展和迁移提供了更强大的框架。新兴的数据源，如最新的卫星观测和改进的地面传感器网络，可能进一步增强 TPV 研究的细致性和准确性。
